# To Do's before our session

::: panel-tabset
## Read

-   Chapter 10: Mapping Data in Cairo, The Truthful Art
    -   Please access the chapter via Katalog Primo (University library)
-   Chapter 7: Draw maps in Healy, Data Visualization. A practical introduction. [Link to free online version](https://socviz.co/maps.html)
-   Chapter 15: Geospatial data in Wilke, Fundamentals of Data Visualization. [Link to free online version](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/geospatial-data.html)

**Helpful and interesting readings**

-   [Video: Why all maps are wrong](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kIID5FDi2JQ)

## Think

-   Questions to think about for the readings:
